question.title: Value of Spinner Clipped in Java Swing
question.body:
I have a Spinner like below. when initialize the spinner there are not any issue. but when changing from one UI to other for edit and come back to earlier UI, value of Spinner is clipped. How to fix it.

CamSpinner privado getValiditySpinner() { 
   if (spinnerValidity == null) { 
      spinnerValidity = nuevo CamSpinner();   
      spinnerValidity.setModel(new SpinnerNumberModel(1, 1, 99, 1)); 
      spinnerValidity.setPreferredSize(Dimensi√≥n(35, 20));   
      spinnerValidity.setName(OutboxComponentNameConstants.DRUG_OUTBOX_LAST_D AY_OF_VALIDITY_SPINNER); 
      ValidationComponentUtils.setMessageKey(this.spinnerValidity, 
             DrugPackageInformationModel.Property.validityPeriod); 
   } 
   return spinnerValidity; 
}
